title: View Only mode kicks off logged in user.
author: FickoDeLux
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

## Expected Behavior
Connecting to running session (User logged in) should not kick off the user in "View Only mode"

Implementation should use shadowing:

On host:
`
HKLM\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows NT\Terminal Services\Shadow set to 4
`

Client:
`
mstsc.exe /v:<server> /shadow:<ID> /noConsentPrompt
`

`
query session /server:<server>
`
output could be used for parsing for ID.
